algorithm_technique: Prefix sums on bit positions to calculate product of powers.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate product of powers of 2 within given ranges, modulo a large number.
problem_summary_technical: Uses prefix sums of bit indices to efficiently compute range products of powers of 2, leveraging binary representation.
key_insights: The problem can be rephrased as finding the sum of exponents of 2 within a range.
Prefix sums on the exponents of 2 allow for O(1) range sum queries after O(log n) preprocessing.
Modular exponentiation is crucial for handling large products.
